00464 /*

00469     if (adapter != NULL)
00470         adapter->Close();

00473 /*
00474  * Returns the file size.
00475  */
00476 unsigned int FusionCELData::GetFileSize()
00477 {
00478         assert(filename != "");
00479 
00480         unsigned int size = 0;
00481         struct stat st;
00482         if (stat(filename.c_str(), &st) == 0)
00483         {
00484                 size = st.st_size;
00485         }
00486         return size;
00487 }
00488 
00489 /*
00490  * Check if the file exists.
00491  */
00492 bool FusionCELData::Exists()
00493 {
00494         assert(filename != "");
00495 
00496         // Find the file stats.
00497         struct stat st;
00498         return ((stat(filename.c_str(), &st) == 0)? true: false);
00499 }
00500 
00501 /*
00502  * Reads the header of the CEL file.
00503  */
00504 bool FusionCELData::ReadHeader()
00505 {
00506     if (Exists() == false)
00507         return false;
00508     try
00509     {
00510         CreateAdapter();
00511         return adapter->ReadHeader();
00512     }
00513     catch (...)
00514     {
00515         return false;
00516     }
00517 }
00518 
00519 /*
00520  * Reads the CEL file.
00521  */
00522 bool FusionCELData::Read(bool bIncludeMaskAndOutliers)
00523 {
00524     if (Exists() == false)
00525         return false;
00526     try
00527     {
00528         CreateAdapter();
00529             return adapter->Read(bIncludeMaskAndOutliers);
00530     }
00531     catch (...)
00532     {
00533         return false;
00534     }
00535 }
00536 
00537 /*
00538  * Determine CEL file format and call appropriate function to read file using the specified file name.
00539  */
00540 bool FusionCELData::ReadEx(const char *filename_, int state)
00541 {
00542         filename = filename_;
00543     if (Exists() == false)
00544         return false;
00545     try
00546     {
00547         CreateAdapter();
00548             return adapter->ReadEx(filename_, state);
00549     }
00550     catch (...)
00551     {
00552         return false;
00553     }
00554 }
00555 
00556 /*
00557  * Returns the reading state.
00558  */
00559 int FusionCELData::GetReadState()
00560 {
00561         CheckAdapter();
00562         return adapter->GetReadState();
00563 }
00564 
00565 /*
00566  * Clears the members.
00567  */
00568 void FusionCELData::Clear()
00569 {
00570         if (adapter)
00571                 adapter->Clear();
00572         parameterListRead = false;
00573         parameterList.clear();
00574 }
00575 
00576 /*
00577  */
00578 void FusionCELData::CreateAdapter()
00579 {
00580         DeleteAdapter();
00581 
00582         // Create a Calvin adapter
00583         IFusionCELDataAdapter* calvinAdapter = new CalvinCELDataAdapter;
00584         if (calvinAdapter)
00585         {
00586                 calvinAdapter->SetFileName(filename);
00587                 if (calvinAdapter->CanReadFile())
00588                 {
00589                         adapter = calvinAdapter;
00590                 }
00591                 else
00592                 {
00593                         delete calvinAdapter;
00594                         IFusionCELDataAdapter* gcosAdapter = new GCOSCELDataAdapter;
00595                         if (gcosAdapter)
00596                         {
00597                                 gcosAdapter->SetFileName(filename);
00598                                 if (gcosAdapter->CanReadFile())
00599                                 {
00600                                         adapter = gcosAdapter;
00601                                 }
00602                                 else
00603                                 {
00604                                         UnableToOpenFileException e;
00605                                         throw e;
00606                                 }
00607                         }
00608                         else
00609                         {
00610                                 UnableToOpenFileException e;
00611                                 throw e;
00612                         }
00613                 }
00614         }
00615 }
00616 
00617 /*
00618  */
00619 void FusionCELData::DeleteAdapter()
00620 {
00621         if (adapter)
00622                 delete adapter;
00623         adapter = 0;
00624 }
00625 
00626 /*
00627  */
00628 void FusionCELData::CheckAdapter() const
00629 {
00630         if (adapter == 0)
00631         {
00632                 FileNotOpenException e;
00633                 throw e;
00634         }
00635 }
00636 
00637 /*
00638  */
00639 void FusionCELData::FillParameterList()
00640 {
00641         if (parameterListRead == false)
00642         {
00643                 adapter->GetParameters(parameterList);
00644                 parameterListRead = true;
00645         }
00646 }

00648 /* Sets the active data group for a multi-group CEL file. Default is the first group. */
00649 void FusionCELData::SetActiveDataGroup(const std::wstring &groupName)
00650 {
00651         CheckAdapter();
00652         adapter->SetActiveDataGroup(groupName);
00653 }
